dr.evolution.alignment
Class ConvertAlignment

java.lang.Object
  dr.evolution.alignment.Alignment.Abstract
      dr.evolution.alignment.WrappedAlignment
          dr.evolution.alignment.ConvertAlignment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Alignment, PatternList, SiteList, SequenceList, TaxonList, Identifiable, XHTMLable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Taxon>
public class ConvertAlignment
extends WrappedAlignment
implements XHTMLable

An alignment class that takes another alignment and converts it on the fly to a different dataType.

Version:
$Id: ConvertAlignment.java,v 1.29 2005/05/24 20:25:55 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut, Alexei Drummond

setDataType

public void setDataType(DataType dataType)
Sets the dataType of this alignment. This can be different from the dataTypes of the contained alignment - they will be translated as required.
